guides.name: Donnie
bio: Former Marine training instructor who is passionate about people correctly rafting.  I might look small, but I am full of passion and you will be a true champion if you select me as your guide.

guides.name: Leonard
bio: Sorry, not named after the band.  Skinnered because I used to be a skate boarder and I have a ton of skinned legs to the point that now I have permanent scars on both legs. Now I raft!

guides.name: Molly
bio: They don't call me Molly Mormon for no reason.  It is rafting and church and that is how simply I keep my life. With me, you will know Heavenly Father will protect us from the mean rapids.
